abstract: China is now the world’s fastest-growing destination for American exports.
snippet: China is now the world’s fastest-growing destination for American exports.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — America’s huge trade deficit with China has raised concerns about American competitiveness and jobs moving overseas. But a new study offers a glimmer of hope to Americans: Last year, American exports to China soared 32 percent to a record $91.9 billion.

headline.main: As China Grows, So Does Its Appetite for American-Made Products
